title: "permanently banned league of legends"
body:
LOOOOOOL 
Riot games becoming even more of a joke that they ever been... 
I just got banned from my smurf account (silver2) Main plat2. For what? Cus i had mid with a smite and jng items.. And on the same team i had a camille support that just fed everyone so i got little mad as 90% of the normal players who cares about their winnings will be. 
Anyway i will ban this game from my games list and switch over to Dota2 like what many of the big streamers did. 
GL with this kids game RIOT its really becoming a joke and when players getting lil older they are leaving this game cus too many kids trolling and you cannot control it... Like for real what am i suppose to do with a mid with smite that buys jng items and camille support that just dying all game? Keep playing and say "wow this is fun"? Or am i suppose to be able to pick up my team by myself and if i see on champ select that i have a camille suport i can choose if i want to play with him or not without getting a 5-20 min wait cus i "dodged" a game.... making $900Mil a year but still 0 brain.

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

I feel for you, losing an account and/or access to a game you enjoyed is a terrible thing to go through, but ultimately it is your own words that got you punished, not other people. If you would like help identifying why you could have been banned then feel free to share your chat logs from the reform card that popped up in your game-client.

Acting superior and calling them a 'joke' is not a very good way to get them to listen to you. If you want the system to be changed then you had best present your reasoning in a respectable manner.

I really don`t care about calling Riot a joke because if Imaqtpie, Sneaky, T1, Dom and many more calling them a JOKE means they needs to understand they are becoming a joke for many professional players and do something.. If not they will lose the real gamers and stay with trolling kids.
People have said this since Season 1. What's different now?
Look dude, I want to agree with you, but I cannot side with you unless I've seen your chat log to ensure that you didn't do something punishable.

Game 1
verybadplayer14: well
verybadplayer14: all lanes lose without jng
verybadplayer14: i will report you for feeding 
verybadplayer14: you feed first 10 min…
verybadplayer14: bot 0/4 in 7 min
verybadplayer14: top lost 1v1
verybadplayer14: mid lost 1v1
verybadplayer14: i hit no lol
Game 2
verybadplayer14: idc i have 90% win on this account
verybadplayer14: dude you camille support
verybadplayer14: even in bronze norms games you dont see that
verybadplayer14: you won lane cus you have a good adc
verybadplayer14: now you cant do anything
verybadplayer14: idc
verybadplayer14: i have 90% win with this noob silver 2 account :)
verybadplayer14: Ori have smite and jungle items…Why am I paying the price?
verybadplayer14: She is 0/9 now lol funnnnn

Are you aware of the effects of flaming teammates? If a teammate is a troll or if they are feeling spiteful, then antagonizing them will only spur them to act worse. And if they are simply having a bad game then antagonizing them will only distract them and make them play worse. If you care about winning matches then you should not be tilting your teammates with your chat.

Repeatedly calling people feeders is not something I can side with. Sorry amigo.
ban = justified
"I really don`t care about calling Riot a joke" -----then why did you make this post?

I mean League of Legends remains one of the MOST competitive in E-Sports. Sneaky is still on Cloud 9 performing competitively, and through many interviews has said that he enjoys the game. 

'Rito' is a meme that many players and streamers use and enjoy. That being said, I'm willing to bet that most if not all of us appreciate Riot and League of Legends. I for one really enjoy League of Legends and will continue to do so for years.

Logs or gtfo.

You did not get banned for going mid with smite. You got banned for how you reacted to your team when they accused you of being an intentional feeder.

I like how you posted this on a different account so nobody can see the game in question, i wonder why?
Let me see... You replying from an unranked account and saying i`m posting from a different account? LOL you must be one of the trolling noob kids as your winning rate :)

> LOL you must be one of the trolling noob kids

I think I know why you got banned lol.
Why because i called you a noob kid? LOL see whats happening? If anyone who called someone "noob kid" on this was getting banned there was no players on this game :)

You didn't call me anything btw.

If you insult someone as a noob kid once in a blue moon you probably won't even get a chat restriction.

You however don't seem to be doing way more than that way more often.  You just came off your 14 day ban this month my dude. You couldn't even play 10 games after your last ban before getting perma banned lol
You a bus driver?.....cause you just took this guy to school XD XD XD
If he doens't then I sure do XD

> [{quoted}](name=verybadplayer14,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RKluvHa4,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-02-21T23:32:31.962+0000)
>
> Let me see... You replying from an unranked account and saying i`m posting from a different account? LOL you must be one of the trolling noob kids as your winning rate :)

If you had bothered to look at the account (or even hover your mouse over it), you would see i am gold ranked.

I am not going to waste my time playing ranked this season until it passes midseason, waiting for all the brats to drain off to bronze V or get banned so i dont need to deal with their behavior as often.
no need to look at your account. We all know everything we need to know from your words on this thread alone XD can't save face at this point man

> [{quoted}](name=cuddlykitten4,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RKluvHa4,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2018-02-22T01:04:57.360+0000)
>
> no need to look at your account. We all know everything we need to know from your words on this thread alone XD can't save face at this point man

What am i saving face from? Some permbanned brats that want to pretend i am unranked have no impact on my reputation or life.

Lol: https://i.imgur.com/r4bHSHV.jpg

Since you will pathetically say this is photoshopped, I will just set my gold rank icon so it is visible on this post, and watch you try to pretend you cant see it.

Incidentally why do you care about this? Rank has nothing to do with player behavior.

Actually, I wasn't going to call it photoshopped. I"m more confused on why you even posted it at all. I don't find it to be impressive, nor do I care. I'm not even sure what you think I'm supposed to get out of it. Also, I"m not permabanned. I've never been banned. Had a chat restriction one time like 3 and a half years ago if you want to count that I guess. The only reason I believe you are bringing that stuff up though is because I don't think you can counterpoint wiht an actual point so you're trying to play a wild card. I"m just not impressed by it man. You could be Master tier for all I care, and still be bronze ranked as a human being. It kind of humors me that you threw your rank into it though. To answer your last paragraph, I actually don't care at all. I'm mostly just killing time out of boredom. Of course rank has nothing to do with player behavior, that's why I don't understand why you're bringing rank into it. I never mentioned it once. You're kinda just making this stuff up as you go aren't you? XD

Also, this is extra funny to me because I thought it was the OP I was responding to. I stand by what I say though, your attitude needs work.

> [{quoted}](name=cuddlykitten4,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RKluvHa4,comment-id=000300000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-22T02:30:30.377+0000)

Of course rank has nothing to do with player behavior, that's why I don't understand why you're bringing rank into it. I never mentioned it once. You're kinda just making this stuff up as you go aren't you? XD
> 
> Also, this is extra funny to me because I thought it was the OP I was responding to. I stand by what I say though, your attitude needs work.

I cant remember the name of every passive-aggressive little shit that randomly insults me on the boards, sorry. Dozens of you guys every day, all equally annoying and forgettable. Like mosquitoes.

Maybe you should work on not doing that before trying to lecture other people on their attitudes.

I'm not passive aggressive XD I'm blunt and direct by nature. That's why I'm straight up saying these things to you rather than implying them XD XD Everyone is forgettable when attached to a screen name on a forum. We are all nobodies here to each other. Was that supposed to be an insult? I'm not insulted. I don't really get insulted to be honest. Again, I still say you need to work on your attitude.

Also, lectures are specifically intended to teach or be educational. I'm mostly just pointing out flaws and reflecting discussion. They are different things.

^ That was a lecture XD

^ and that was me giving you something passive aggressive so you don't have to be wrong about that anymore XD You're welcome

Just so you know man, I"m pretty much like this nonstop. You're just going to end up irritated, and I'm just going to get laughs out of it. I'm just giving you a heads up on that now because I don't want you to spiral into some kind of annoyed fury that can't be avoided if you're one of those people who get mad if you can't convince everyone to hive mind with you. Only seems fair to let you know.

100% True man. This is just sad and i hope someone in Riot Games will finally listen to the gamers and will do something with players who just troll games while the ones who really wants to win and love this game** paying the price**. {{champion:150}}

Don't encourage them. Players are each responsible for their own behavior. Trolls need to be punished, but it's just as unpleasant to play with a flamer on your team as it is to have a troll on the team that the flamer is aiming their rage at.
Makes a smurf to play at a level lower than his skill level......gets mad at teammates when they don't play at his skill level....that's some pro logic right there

Yeah it's only really fun for me with friends these days. Playing solo, I imagine is just an exhausting process. Me and a couple buddies get online on the weekends and drink beer and trash eachother over twitch chat while playing stupid gimmick teams on twisted treeline. It's fucking hilarious. (Voli singed Urgot flip squad undefeated baby!)

However, I've never received a punishment even when playing off meta shit cuz I just don't care enough to trash strangers over their video game skills. Maybe if you would chill out and stop taking a game so serious, you wouldn't be banned. Becausw everyone knows your ban had nothing to do with your off meta pick. It was the insulting and berating of your team that got you where you are. I hope you had fun trashing them at least. But you know you made no difference to them. No one takes you seriously so I don't know the point of shit talking anonymous screen names.

You are the exact reason i made this post. Becuse of players like you this game is becoming trash. If you do not care about this video game its ok other playing to get better and win but if i get someone on my team like you there is no way i can win this match even if i invented this game. The point is that its ok if you want to just have fun and just drink a beer with friends while playing, nothing wrong with that BUT don`t come and play rank games so you won`t make anyone lose points he worked really hard to earn. 
And for sure you never got any punish and again this is the exact reason i made this post BECAUSE you are the one who should get punish for trolling rank games with friends making fun of others while drinking beers while others really trying to win so they get mad and they get the punish but you keep playing and trolling games.

Well all I have to say to that is hah hah you're upset and I'm having fun with the game. Yeah, go to dota2 man. No one trolls there I'm sure. Btw, I'm a try Hard in game. I can't just NOT try to win a game. You don't know me. I don't know how people can say "meh I'm not trying"... it just doesn't sound fun to me. I always try my best. How can someone not? You're there, you're playing, how are you not "trying"? They just shut part of their brain off? I don't get people like that. Also, if I go to ranked, I play strictly anivia mid because I want to win games. But like your whole point, playing the game seriously is just not fun anymore, so I tend to stick to normals and twisted treeline with friends. You will never see me troll on your team, unless maaaybe it's an unranked. And even then, my "trolling" is merely me try Harding on an off meta pick.

Thanks for making this thread for me though. It reinforces the idea that I'm doing it right, because you sound miserable.

How can i be miserable when they banned a smurf s2 account :) i have a main plat 2 s8 that finish d3 s8 so i don`t really care about the account all i`m trying to say is players getting hard stuck bronze/silver only because of players like you that just "drinking beers with friends and having fun on twitch streams".

> [{quoted}](name=verybadplayer14,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RKluvHa4,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-22T03:10:25.018+0000)
>
> How can i be miserable when they banned a smurf s2 account :) i have a main plat 2 s8 that finish d3 s8 so i don`t really care about the account all i`m trying to say is players getting hard stuck bronze/silver only because of players like you that just "drinking beers with friends and having fun on twitch streams".

Oh, sorry. Yeah you sound like you have a great time playing. Have fun with dota2, even though you're clearly not miserable playing league suddenly.

> For what? Cus i had mid with a smite and jng items.. And on the same team i had a camille support that just fed everyone

Ya no, you got banned for your immature and extreme *reaction* to that situation. 

>  i got little mad

how about you post chat logs so we can see just how "little" your anger was? No? That's alright, I'm sure my imagination is close enough.

> switch over to Dota2 like what many of the big streamers did.

source needed.

> GL with this kids game RIOT its really becoming a joke and when players getting lil older they are leaving this game cus too many kids trolling and you cannot control it... 

If you got permanently banned, you behaved like a child, so idk how you can call this a kids game like you're somehow better than it. Sources needed for the rest of your quote here, cuz I disagree.

> Like for real what am i suppose to do with a mid with smite that buys jng items and camille support that just dying all game?

honestly, I don't know. I can tell you what you *don't* do though: You don't throw a temper tantrum. You don't act immature. You don't vent towards people you don't know and intentionally ruin the game for the rest of the players involved. If you can't control yourself under unfun or stressful situations, you should log off from any online game bud

Any questions? Did I miss anything?

chat logs?

You know the funny thing is league's tribunal system is flawed. I tested this with my friends. I played a game with 4 of my friends in the same queue and I told them to report me after the game. Furthermore, one of my friends asked the enemy team to report me after the game as well for toxicity and well, since we dominated the game, 3 of them agreed to do so. Most importantly, I made sure I didn't say a single word in game just to see the effect that this trial would have on me. Turns out, after the following game I played, I got the message saying I've been chat restricted for 9 games due to bad behavior.  It's not about whether you were toxic or not. 


So basically the system comes down to this:

If you are toxic but only 1 person reports you, you will be pretty much safe from any punishment resulting from that game.
If you are not toxic but 4+ players report you, you're almost guaranteed a punishment even if those are all false reports.


It was an interesting experiment and I'm just glad it was a chat restriction not a full fledged account ban. 

What I learned from this experiment is to not say anything in game but to also not stomp the other team so hard in order to avoid any frustration reports.

> [{quoted}](name=Trıck,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RKluvHa4,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2018-06-24T20:49:17.347+0000)
>
> You know the funny thing is league's tribunal system is flawed. I tested this with my friends. I played a game with 4 of my friends in the same queue and I told them to report me after the game. Furthermore, one of my friends asked the enemy team to report me after the game as well for toxicity and well, since we dominated the game, 3 of them agreed to do so. Most importantly, I made sure I didn't say a single word in game just to see the effect that this trial would have on me. Turns out, after the following game I played, I got the message saying I've been chat restricted for 9 games due to bad behavior.  It's not about whether you were toxic or not. 
> 
> 
> So basically the system comes down to this:
> 
> If you are toxic but only 1 person reports you, you will be pretty much safe from any punishment resulting from that game.
> If you are not toxic but 4+ players report you, you're almost guaranteed a punishment even if those are all false reports.
> 
> 
> It was an interesting experiment and I'm just glad it was a chat restriction not a full fledged account ban. 
> 
> What I learned from this experiment is to not say anything in game but to also not stomp the other team so hard in order to avoid any frustration reports.

First things first: Tribunal doesn't exist anymore. The Instant Feedback System is what hands out punishments now.

Second off, it only takes one report to flag a game for review, so unless you're displaying punishable behavior the game will be thrown out if nothing of guilt is found regardless of how many people report you. From [Riot Tantram](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/t4BNHARj-banned-again?comment=00030000000000000002) (aka the guy who wrote the entire system): 

>4+ reports is the same as 1.

>A report, or 9 reports, flag a game for review.

>if (reports > 0) {
reviewGame();
}

Since you got a chat restriction I can only assume that you've been validly reported for poor behavior in multiple games (which is what actually caused your punishment) and are using this one outlier game as an excuse to try to discredit how the IFS works. If I'm wrong then make your own thread and post your entire unedited chat logs in it rather than posting in a 4 month old thread with a bold claim like this.
I feel ya man i wish things will change here.. They wasting so much time on making new champs instead of fixing the basic stuff like the game experience.??!?!?! Anyone?~?~?~?
{{sticker:galio-happy}}  I am never trolling and just playing the game but it`s very hard to enjoy this game when so many players just do whatever they want without giving a f*** about us.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3EiBF0IZ74 
This what`s happening... Biggest players going to other games and saying it feels so good playing it compare to LOL. Again idc i am just the small player and cannot change anything but its funny that Riot do not make it fair for the real gamers that really playing PC games all day and wasting time cus other players trolling...
